author: Aila Slisco
title: Truckers Readying D.C. Convoy Want 'Justice for Ashli' Babbitt, Shot Jan. 6
description: Babbitt's death during the Capitol riot has become a rallying cry for supporters of former President Donald Trump.
content: American truckers preparing to protest against COVID-19 restrictions will also reportedly seek "justice" for Ashli Babbitt, who was killed after breaching the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021. Above, â€¦ [+3432 chars]
